name: Diaspora* New Style Dark
description:
/* unmaintained, you can instead use the official dark theme from Settings -> Account -> Change Color Theme -> Dark */ 

Also here are some other styles you can merge:
No Frame: https://userstyles.org/styles/132016/diaspora-0-6-no-frame
changing the width of the content box and font size: https://userstyles.org/styles/132155/diaspora-0-6-content-tweak
Max height for image: https://userstyles.org/styles/133146/diaspora-image-max-height
Max height for content: https://userstyles.org/styles/135045/diaspora-content-max-height

If you find this userstyle interfere with other websites you use, you have to remove relative regexp address at the beginning of the stylesheet and add your domain.

Credit: this style is based on CirKu17's D* Gy (Diaspora style) https://userstyles.org/styles/60545/d-gy-diaspora-style
